start: Hello, I am %s, a Telegram bot with various features, to know more, click on "List commands in PM" button below
help_find_more:
You can find more info about command by typing after /help, like this: 
/help /cash
chat_banned:
Hi. I am sorry, but my admin/me blocked this chat, so I will leave it.
Reason: %s.
Please contact bot admin for unbanning this chat
error_occured: I am sorry, unknown error occured during working with your request, Admin were notified
not_enough_arguments: Not enough arguments supplied. Please refer to documentation: /help %s
help_button_into_pm_text: To prevent flood, use this command in PM
